summary: Adds Vans to Skyrim. Do not try to drive.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=10] Vans In Skyrim [/size][/center]

This mod adds Vans to Skyrim. They were created by retexuring the barkeepers shoes so they aren't using any type of fancy models.

[size=5]Where do I find them?[/size]

They are found in a chest upstairs in Riverwood Trader. NOTE: The chest is floating upside down; due to the lack of gravity this mod is not very lore-friendly.

[size=5]What Colors?[/size]

[color=Red]Red[/color]
[color=Orange]Orange[/color]
[color=Yellow]Yellow[/color]
[color=Green]Green[/color]
[color=Navy]Navy Blue[/color]
[color=Magenta]Purple[/color]
[color=Brown]Brown[/color]
[color=White]White[/color]
[color=Grey]Grey[/color]
[color=Black]Black[/color]
C[color=Black]h[/color]e[color=Black]c[/color]k[color=Black]e[/color]r[color=Black]e[/color]d
[color=Orchid]Galaxy[/color]

If you want more colors/designs just ask I will probably be able to add them for you, I have also included an optional download for a .psd template to make your own version to replace a color if you know how to make textures yourself.
author: Scklyic
